Use the tutoring any chance you get your life will be much easier in school. Use eops for students who qualify, they help with classes , books and other expenses. Chaffey offers health services for current students and scholarships.
Chaffey is a great school with great instructors. They offer wonderful free tutoring in every subject. Chaffey has a nice campus and great new improvements.

TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {359723=Security guards roam around all the time. I'm taking a couple night classes that sometimes go on until 10-10:30 and not once have i felt unsafe to walk across campus alone at night., 374525=© 2015, Cappex.com, LLC, 59567=Pretty safe; I've been stargazing on campus at 10pm on two different occasions, and both times I was stopped by campus police and questioned. Considering that classes go on until around 9:30 at night, security is pretty good, even during non-traditional class hours., 261022=This semester I had classes from 7:00 am until 10:00 pm and I have never felt safer. Campus police are always present. It's a very safe campus!}

There are various programs and organizations that can assist you on your journey like the Honors Program, Phi Theta Kappa, and the Associated Students of Chaffey College.
